title: Add three new inspection items to checklist

requirements.text: Add a new checklist item 'Is the washer drain properly secured in the drain pipe?' to the plumbing/laundry section of the checklist form. This should follow the same YesNoField pattern used by other items in that section.

quotes: Is the washer drain properly secured in the drain pipe?

acceptanceCriteria: The new question appears in the plumbing/laundry section of the checklist
The item uses the same YesNoField component as other checklist items
The field value is included in the generated PDF output
The default value is stored in defaults.ts and the type is defined in types.ts

requirements.text: Add a new checklist item 'If there are any gas burning appliances, test for Carbon Monoxide.' to the safety/appliances section of the checklist form. This should follow the same YesNoField pattern used by other items in that section.

quotes: If there are any gas burning appliances, test for Carbon Monoxide.

acceptanceCriteria: The new question appears in the safety/appliances section of the checklist
The item uses the same YesNoField component as other checklist items
The field value is included in the generated PDF output
The default value is stored in defaults.ts and the type is defined in types.ts

requirements.text: Add a new checklist item 'When turning the water on, how long does it take for the hot water to arrive?' to the plumbing/water heater section of the checklist form. This item should use a text input field (not a yes/no field) to allow the inspector to enter a duration or description.

quotes: When turning the water on, how long does it take for the hot water to arrive?

acceptanceCriteria: The new question appears in the plumbing/water heater section of the checklist
The item uses an appropriate input field allowing free-text or numeric entry for duration
The field value is included in the generated PDF output
The default value is stored in defaults.ts and the type is defined in types.ts

constraints: Do not change the overall layout or structure of existing checklist sections
New items must follow the existing component patterns (YesNoField or equivalent text field)
All new fields must be reflected in types.ts, defaults.ts, and generateChecklistPdf.ts
nonGoals: Redesigning or restructuring existing checklist sections
Adding new sections beyond the three placement areas specified
Changing PDF upload or download logic
